content: I'd like an example shiny future story or two for the blog post. I have some ideas I might write, but I was wondering, @pnkfelix, did you have a story you wanted to post? Anybody else? @Esteban Küber?
:thumbs_up: i think an example shiny future story could be really helpful to get those creative juices flowing for others who might want to contribute their own story
I think I can bake something up quickly
I didn’t open a PR yet, because I’m not sure if I should.E.g. the current shiny_future/template.md still says “not time yet!"

(I did my best to adapt the boilerplate text from the status quo template to fit the shiny future template. I’m going to make a separate PR now with my suggested changes there; I’m not sure if Niko had something else planned.)
@pnkfelix go ahead and open a PR -- I'd like to have some examples for the blog post!
technically the period began last week anyway
Right but there were, as I noted, other red flags
anyway if you have a moment, take a peek at the PR I did put up for the shiny_futures.template.md
And I’ll open a PR for barbara_makes_a_wish now as wel
